card.name: Abzan Advantage
card.text: Target player sacrifices an enchantment. Bolster 1.

card.name: Abzan Beastmaster
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.

card.name: Abzan Kin-Guard
card.text: Abzan Kin-Guard has lifelink as long as you control a white or black permanent.

card.name: Abzan Runemark
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has vigilance as long as you control a black or green permanent.

card.name: Abzan Skycaptain
card.text: Flying When Abzan Skycaptain dies, bolster 2.

card.name: Ainok Guide
card.text: When Ainok Guide enters the battlefield, choose one - - Put a +1/+1 counter on Ainok Guide. - Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Alesha's Vanguard
card.text: Dash {2}{B}

card.name: Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
card.text: First strike Whenever Alesha, Who Smiles at Death attacks, you may pay {WB}{WB}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Ambush Krotiq
card.text: Trample When Ambush Krotiq enters the battlefield, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Ancestral Vengeance
card.text: Enchant creature When Ancestral Vengeance enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Enchanted creature gets -1/-1.

card.name: Arashin Cleric
card.text: When Arashin Cleric enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Arashin War Beast
card.text: Whenever Arashin War Beast deals combat damage to one or more blocking creatures, manifest the top card of your library.

card.name: Arcbond
card.text: Choose target creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage this turn, it deals that much damage to each other creature and each player.

card.name: Archfiend of Depravity
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.

card.name: Atarka, World Render
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Aven Surveyor
card.text: Flying When Aven Surveyor enters the battlefield, choose one - - Put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Surveyor. - Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Bathe in Dragonfire
card.text: Bathe in Dragonfire deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Battle Brawler
card.text: As long as you control a red or white permanent, Battle Brawler gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

card.name: Battlefront Krushok
card.text: Battlefront Krushok can't be blocked by more than one creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Bloodfell Caves
card.text: Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped. When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Bloodfire Enforcers
card.text: Bloodfire Enforcers has first strike and trample as long as an instant card and a sorcery card are in your graveyard.

card.name: Blossoming Sands
card.text: Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped. When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Break Through the Line
card.text: {R}: Target creature with power 2 or less gains haste until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Brutal Hordechief
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {3}{RW}{RW}: Creatures your opponents control block this turn if able, and you choose how those creatures block.

card.name: Cached Defenses
card.text: Bolster 3.

card.name: Channel Harm
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and permanents you control this turn by sources you don't control. If damage is prevented this way, you may have Channel Harm deal that much damage to target creature.

card.name: Citadel Siege
card.text: As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. - Khans - At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. - Dragons - At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

card.name: Cloudform
card.text: When Cloudform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Cloudform to it. Enchanted creature has flying and hexproof.

card.name: Collateral Damage
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Collateral Damage, sacrifice a creature. Collateral Damage deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Crucible of the Spirit Dragon
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Crucible of the Spirit Dragon. {T}, Remove X storage counters from Crucible of the Spirit Dragon: Add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells or activate abilities of Dragons.

card.name: Crux of Fate
card.text: Choose one - - Destroy all Dragon creatures. - Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

card.name: Cunning Strike
card.text: Cunning Strike deals 2 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player. Draw a card.

card.name: Daghatar the Adamant
card.text: Vigilance Daghatar the Adamant enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{BG}{BG}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature onto a second target creature.

card.name: Dark Deal
card.text: Each player discards all the cards in his or her hand, then draws that many cards minus one.

card.name: Defiant Ogre
card.text: When Defiant Ogre enters the battlefield, choose one - - Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Ogre. - Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Destructor Dragon
card.text: Flying When Destructor Dragon dies, destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Diplomacy of the Wastes
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. If you control a Warrior, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Dismal Backwater
card.text: Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped. When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Douse in Gloom
card.text: Douse in Gloom deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Dragonrage
card.text: Add {R} to your mana pool for each attacking creature you control. Until end of turn, attacking creatures you control gain "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Dragonscale General
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, bolster X, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control.

card.name: Dromoka, the Eternal
card.text: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, bolster 2.

card.name: Elite Scaleguard
card.text: When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

card.name: Enhanced Awareness
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Ethereal Ambush
card.text: Manifest the top two cards of your library.

card.name: Fascination
card.text: Choose one - - Each player draws X cards. - Each player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Fearsome Awakening
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's a Dragon, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Fierce Invocation
card.text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Flamerush Rider
card.text: Whenever Flamerush Rider attacks, put a token onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that's a copy of another target attacking creature. Exile the token at end of combat. Dash {2}{R}{R}

card.name: Flamewake Phoenix
card.text: Flying, haste Flamewake Phoenix attacks each turn if able. Ferocious - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Flamewake Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Formless Nurturing
card.text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Friendly Fire
card.text: Target creature's controller reveals a card at random from his or her hand. Friendly Fire deals damage to that creature and that player equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Frontier Mastodon
card.text: Ferocious - Frontier Mastodon enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Frontier Siege
card.text: As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. - Khans - At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G} to your mana pool. - Dragons - Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

card.name: Frost Walker
card.text: When Frost Walker becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

card.name: Fruit of the First Tree
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is its toughness.

card.name: Ghastly Conscription
card.text: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards.

card.name: Goblin Boom Keg
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Goblin Boom Keg. When Goblin Boom Keg is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Goblin Heelcutter
card.text: Whenever Goblin Heelcutter attacks, target creature can't block this turn. Dash {2}{R}

card.name: Grave Strength
card.text: Choose target creature. Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, then put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each creature card in your graveyard.

card.name: Grim Contest
card.text: Choose target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its toughness to the other.

card.name: Harsh Sustenance
card.text: Harsh Sustenance deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Hero's Blade
Hewed Stone Retainers
card.text: Cast Hewed Stone Retainers only if you've cast another spell this turn.

card.name: Honor's Reward
card.text: You gain 4 life. Bolster 2.

card.name: Hooded Assassin
card.text: When Hooded Assassin enters the battlefield, choose one - - Put a +1/+1 counter on Hooded Assassin. - Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Humble Defector
card.text: {T}: Draw two cards. Target opponent gains control of Humble Defector. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Hungering Yeti
card.text: As long as you control a green or blue permanent, you may cast Hungering Yeti as though it had flash.

card.name: Hunt the Weak
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Jeskai Barricade
card.text: Flash Defender When Jeskai Barricade enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Jeskai Infiltrator
card.text: Jeskai Infiltrator can't be blocked as long as you control no other creatures. When Jeskai Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, exile it and the top card of your library in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards.

card.name: Jeskai Runemark
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has flying as long as you control a red or white permanent.

card.name: Jeskai Sage
card.text: Prowess When Jeskai Sage dies, draw a card.

card.name: Jungle Hollow
card.text: Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped. When Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Kolaghan, the Storm's Fury
Lightform
card.text: When Lightform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Lightform to it. Enchanted creature has flying and lifelink.

card.name: Lightning Shrieker
card.text: Flying, trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, Lightning Shrieker's owner shuffles it into his or her library.

card.name: Lotus-Eye Mystics
card.text: Prowess When Lotus-Eye Mystics enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Map the Wastes
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Bolster 1.

card.name: Marang River Prowler
card.text: Marang River Prowler can't block and can't be blocked. You may cast Marang River Prowler from your graveyard as long as you control a black or green permanent.

card.name: Mardu Runemark
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has first strike as long as you control a white or black permanent.

card.name: Mardu Scout
card.text: Dash {1}{R}

card.name: Mardu Shadowspear
card.text: Whenever Mardu Shadowspear attacks, each opponent loses 1 life. Dash {1}{B}

card.name: Mardu Strike Leader
card.text: Whenever Mardu Strike Leader attacks, put a 2/1 black Warrior creature token onto the battlefield. Dash {3}{B}

card.name: Mardu Woe-Reaper
card.text: Whenever Mardu Woe-Reaper or another Warrior enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Mastery of the Unseen
card.text: Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, you gain 1 life for each creature you control. {3}{W}: Manifest the top card of your library.

card.name: Merciless Executioner
card.text: When Merciless Executioner enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Mindscour Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Mindscour Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Mistfire Adept
card.text: Prowess Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Mob Rule
card.text: Choose one - - Gain control of all creatures with power 4 or greater until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn. - Gain control of all creatures with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Monastery Mentor
card.text: Prowess Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a 1/1 white Monk creature token with prowess onto the battlefield.

card.name: Monastery Siege
card.text: As Monastery Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. - Khans - At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card, then discard a card. - Dragons - Spells your opponents cast that target you or a permanent you control cost {2} more to cast.

card.name: Neutralizing Blast
card.text: Counter target multicolored spell.

card.name: Noxious Dragon
card.text: Flying When Noxious Dragon dies, you may destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

card.name: Ojutai, Soul of Winter
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, tap target nonland permanent an opponent controls. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Orc Sureshot
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Outpost Siege
card.text: As Outpost Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. - Khans - At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. - Dragons - Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, Outpost Siege deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Palace Siege
card.text: As Palace Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. - Khans - At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. - Dragons - At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Pilgrim of the Fires
card.text: First strike, trample

card.name: Pressure Point
card.text: Tap target creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Pyrotechnics
card.text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Qarsi High Priest
card.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Manifest the top card of your library.

card.name: Rageform
card.text: When Rageform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Rageform to it. Enchanted creature has double strike.

card.name: Rakshasa's Disdain
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.

card.name: Rally the Ancestors
card.text: Return each creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile those creatures at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rally the Ancestors.

card.name: Reach of Shadows
card.text: Destroy target creature that's one or more colors.

card.name: Reality Shift
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of his or her library.

card.name: Refocus
card.text: Untap target creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Renowned Weaponsmith
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts. {U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Return to the Earth
card.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

card.name: Rite of Undoing
card.text: Delve Return target nonland permanent you control and target nonland permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

card.name: Rugged Highlands
card.text: Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped. When Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Ruthless Instincts
card.text: Choose one - - Target nonattacking creature gains reach and deathtouch until end of turn. Untap it. - Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Sage's Reverie
card.text: Enchant creature When Sage's Reverie enters the battlefield, draw a card for each Aura you control that's attached to a creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Aura you control that's attached to a creature.

card.name: Sage-Eye Avengers
card.text: Prowess Whenever Sage-Eye Avengers attacks, you may return target creature to its owner's hand if its power is less than Sage-Eye Avengers's power.

card.name: Sandblast
card.text: Sandblast deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Sandsteppe Mastodon
card.text: Reach When Sandsteppe Mastodon enters the battlefield, bolster 5.

card.name: Sandsteppe Outcast
card.text: When Sandsteppe Outcast enters the battlefield, choose one - - Put a +1/+1 counter on Sandsteppe Outcast. - Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Scoured Barrens
card.text: Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. When Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Scroll of the Masters
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a lore counter on Scroll of the Masters. {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each lore counter on Scroll of the Masters.

card.name: Shaman of the Great Hunt
card.text: Haste Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Ferocious - {2}{GU}{GU}: Draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Shamanic Revelation
card.text: Draw a card for each creature you control. Ferocious - You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Shifting Loyalties
card.text: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a card type.

card.name: Shockmaw Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Shockmaw Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

card.name: Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest
card.text: Prowess Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {RW}{RW}. If you do, target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Sibsig Host
card.text: When Sibsig Host enters the battlefield, each player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Sibsig Muckdraggers
card.text: Delve When Sibsig Muckdraggers enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Silumgar, the Drifting Death
card.text: Flying, hexproof Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Smoldering Efreet
card.text: When Smoldering Efreet dies, it deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Soul Summons
card.text: Manifest the top card of your library.

card.name: Soulfire Grand Master
card.text: Lifelink Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink. {2}{UR}{UR}: The next time you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand this turn, put that card into your hand instead of into your graveyard as it resolves.

card.name: Soulflayer
card.text: Delve If a creature card with flying was exiled with Soulflayer's delve ability, Soulflayer has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, reach, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Sudden Reclamation
card.text: Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard, then return a creature card and a land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sultai Emissary
card.text: When Sultai Emissary dies, manifest the top card of your library.

card.name: Sultai Runemark
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has deathtouch as long as you control a green or blue permanent.

card.name: Sultai Skullkeeper
card.text: When Sultai Skullkeeper enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Supplant Form
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that creature.

card.name: Swiftwater Cliffs
card.text: Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped. When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Tasigur's Cruelty
card.text: Delve Each opponent discards two cards.

card.name: Tasigur, the Golden Fang
card.text: Delve {2}{GU}{GU}: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Temporal Trespass
card.text: Delve Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Trespass.

card.name: Temur Battle Rage
card.text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. Ferocious - That creature also gains trample until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Temur Runemark
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has trample as long as you control a blue or red permanent.

card.name: Temur Sabertooth
card.text: {1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Temur Sabertooth gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Temur War Shaman
card.text: When Temur War Shaman enters the battlefield, manifest the top card of your library. Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

card.name: Thornwood Falls
card.text: Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped. When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Torrent Elemental
card.text: Flying Whenever Torrent Elemental attacks, tap all creatures defending player controls. {3}{BG}{BG}: Put Torrent Elemental from exile onto the battlefield tapped. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Tranquil Cove
card.text: Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped. When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Ugin's Construct
card.text: When Ugin's Construct enters the battlefield, sacrifice a permanent that's one or more colors.

card.name: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon
card.text: +2: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to target creature or player. -X: Exile each permanent with converted mana cost X or less that's one or more colors. -10: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Valorous Stance
card.text: Choose one - - Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. - Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

card.name: Vaultbreaker
card.text: Whenever Vaultbreaker attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Dash {2}{R}

card.name: Wandering Champion
card.text: Whenever Wandering Champion deals combat damage to a player, if you control a blue or red permanent, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: War Flare
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.

card.name: Warden of the First Tree
card.text: {1}{WB}: Warden of the First Tree becomes a Human Warrior with base power and toughness 3/3. {2}{WB}{WB}: If Warden of the First Tree is a Warrior, it becomes a Human Spirit Warrior with trample and lifelink. {3}{WB}{WB}{WB}: If Warden of the First Tree is a Spirit, put five +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Wardscale Dragon
card.text: Flying As long as Wardscale Dragon is attacking, defending player can't cast spells.

card.name: Whisk Away
card.text: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Ferocious - {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Whisperwood Elemental
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, manifest the top card of your library. Sacrifice Whisperwood Elemental: Until end of turn, face-up nontoken creatures you control gain "When this creature dies, manifest the top card of your library."

card.name: Wild Slash
card.text: Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, damage can't be prevented this turn. Wild Slash deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Wildcall
card.text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Will of the Naga
card.text: Delve Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Wind-Scarred Crag
card.text: Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped. When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Winds of Qal Sisma
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, instead prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures your opponents control.

card.name: Write into Being
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Manifest one of those cards, then put the other on the top or bottom of your library.

card.name: Yasova Dragonclaw
card.text: Trample At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {1}{UR}{UR}. If you do, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power less than Yasova Dragonclaw's power until end of turn, untap that creature, and it gains haste until end of turn.
